reviews.text:
Extremely satisfied and stuffed belly = Happy! Happy! Happy! 
Thanks to the amazing staff for getting it done. You have yet to let me down!!
I enjoyed a single classic burger and "large" sweet potato fries at the fast casual chain Smashburger. The burger was solid! It had a great, fresh flavor...
For such a new location, I'm impressed! We ordered for pick-up today, but we're excited to eat inside when we have more time. Very spacious and clean, with...
